CustomField.formula: if ( (TEXT(Fee_Currency__c) == TEXT(Billing_Currency__c)) ,(Fee__c + Claim_Fee__c + Surcharge__c) ,(((Fee__c + Claim_Fee__c + Surcharge__c)/Fee_Unit_Rate_When_Pay__c)/Billing_Currency_Unit_Rate_When_Pay__c) +((((Fee__c + Claim_Fee__c + Surcharge__c)/Fee_Unit_Rate_When_Pay__c)/Billing_Currency_Unit_Rate_When_Pay__c) * (CE_Markup_Percentage__c /100)) )
CustomField.label: PTO Fee (Payable)
